attributes.action: More help for abused children who were in care as a ex care leaver i no
attributes.additional_details: Www.lostincare.com legal documents court papers files payments we need change on who runs these kids homes today befor any more kids die .....
attributes.background: As an ex care leaver who suffered abuse in care i would like to change that for children today no more child abuse i was starved kicked locked in dark rooms made to stand in corners for hours slapped with no outside  conract ..... were do were turn this needs to come out i have legal documents...

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. You could start a petition calling for specific measures to help children who are abused in care,
